table.recordset: {SELECT e.id, e.label, e.dateFrom, e.dateTo FROM calResizeMonth.events e}

textview.label: Selected event
textview.text: {r.id || ": " || r.label || " " || formatDtl( r.dateFrom, (dtf yyyy"-"MM"-"dd" "HH":"mm":"ss) ) || " - " || formatDtl( r.dateTo, (dtf yyyy"-"MM"-"dd" "HH":"mm":"ss) )}
